Watch List for Restaurants Equities -- McDonald's, Yum! Brands, The Wendy's, and Chipotle Mexican Grill
January 27, 2016 8:00 AM
?
Content preferences
Done
NEW YORK, NY / ACCESSWIRE / January 27, 2016 / Park Lane Advisor has initiated coverage on the following equities: McDonald's Corporation ( MCD ), Yum! Brands Inc. ( YUM ), The Wendy's Company ( WEN ), and Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. ( CMG ). Free research report on McDonald's can be accessed at http://www.parklaneadvisor.com/ On Tuesday, January 26, 2016, the NASDAQ Composite ended at 4,567.67, up 1.09%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average advanced 1.78%, to finish the day at 16,167.23, and the S&P 500 closed at 1,903.63, up 1.41%. The gains were broad based as eight out of nine sectors ended the session in positive. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below.
McDonald's Corp.'s stock finished Tuesday's session 1.03% higher at $120.43. A total of 8.28 million shares were traded, which was above its three months average volume of 6.58 million shares. Over the last one month and the previous three months, McDonald's Corp.'s shares have advanced 1.26% and 8.36%, respectively. Additionally, the stock has gained 37.68% in the past one year. The company's shares are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 3.99% and 17.91%, respectively. McDonald's Corp.'s stock traded at a PE ratio of 25.75 and has a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 61.00. Sign up and read the free notes on MCD at:
http://www.parklaneadvisor.com/
On Tuesday, shares in Yum! Brands Inc. ended the session 3.68% higher at $69.87. The stock reported a trading volume of 3.11 million shares, below its three months average volume of 3.95 million shares. Shares of the company traded at a PE ratio of 32.24. The company is trading 1.91% below its 50-day moving average and 12.41% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Yum! Brands Inc. have an RSI of 49.54. The complimentary notes on YUM can be downloaded in PDF format at:
http://www.parklaneadvisor.com/
The Wendy's Co.'s stock advanced 1.41%, to close the day at $9.78. The stock recorded a trading volume of 4.04 million shares, below its three months average volume of 4.30 million shares. The Wendy's Co.'s shares have gained 12.17% in the past three months, but the shares have declined 9.63% in the last one month. The company's shares are trading 2.77% below their 200-day moving average. Additionally, The Wendy's Co. traded at a PE ratio of 42.04 and has an RSI of 42.23. Register for free on Park Lane Advisor and access the latest research on WEN at:
http://www.parklaneadvisor.com/
On Tuesday, shares in Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. recorded a trading volume of 0.76 million shares, lower than their three months average volume of 1.65 million shares. The stock ended the day 1.35% higher at $448.15. Shares of the company traded at a PE ratio of 26.37. The company is trading below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 13.93% and 29.51%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. have an RSI of 40.47. The complete research on CMG is available for free at:

About Park Lane Advisor:
Park Lane Advisor ("PLA") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. PLA has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
PLA has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
PRESS RELEASE PROCEDURES:
The non-sponsored content contained herein has been prepared by a writer (the "Author") and is fact checked and reviewed by a third party research service company (the "Reviewer"). The Reviewer has reviewed and revised the content, as necessary, based on sound investment judgment and publicly available information which is believed to be reliable. The Reviewer and the Sponsor have not performed any independent investigations or forensic audits to validate the information herein. Unless otherwise noted, any content outside of this document has no association with the Author, the Reviewer, or the Sponsor (collectively referred to as the "Production Team") in any way. The Production Team is compensated on a fixed monthly basis and do not hold any positions of interest in any of the securities mentioned herein.
